## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                 | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `label`   | `label`   | The label for the button    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `loading` | `loading` | The flag for loading button | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                           | Type               |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `buttonClick` | Emitted when the control loses focus. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
